name: Party Hard
notes: If Visual C++ Redistributable reports an error, just press OK and finish the installation.

files.gameinstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

content:
files:
- gameinstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Party Hard/PartyHardGame.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Installing game
    executable: gameinstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
